Xenosynth.Web.CmsContext Class Reference

The CmsContext provides methods to quickly access resources within the context of the current application. More...

 The CmsContext for the current application.
WebSite Site [get]
 The WebSite for the current application. The WebSite is determined by the host headers of the current http request.
CmsWebDirectory RootDirectory [get]
 The CmsWebDirectory that is the root directory for the application.

Detailed Description

The CmsContext provides methods to quickly access resources within the context of the current application.

Summary description for CmsContext.

The WebSite for the current application. The WebSite is determined by the host headers of the current http request.
